response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product is not just an item; it's a symbol of excellence and functionality. Given its unique features and the time we've invested in its development, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I kindly propose to offer it to you for $125, reflecting its true value and the benefits it will bring to you. I trust this price will be agreeable and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 125}
